entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
